GoboComponent Class Reference

This class is a GUI component that blends between the given texture and a secondary texture provider. More...

class  ThisAttributeMap

Detailed Description

This class is a GUI component that blends between the given texture and a secondary texture provider.

void GoboComponent::draw ( bool  reallyDraw,
bool  overlay = true 
) [virtual]

This method implements the PyAttachment::draw interface.

Since this gui component draws in the world, this is where we do our actual drawing.

Reimplemented from SimpleGUIComponent.
